column4: I've been unable to boot Breezy properly for a month. Can anyone help? The problem can be seen at: http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/1769
looks like a broken package or the permissions on the package are wrong
I tried deleting the package and redownloading, I tried looking at the /usr install location - doesn't exist. So I touched a file to make it exist. It all still fails
libmp4 seems to have a whole string of dependancies that makes it virtually impossible to remove
